name: DHANWANTARI MEDICAL TRUST
briefDescription: DMT is an organization in Mumbai established in 2005 under Trust act and registered with 12A   and 80G certificates.•Crafting Smile: Crafting Smile is to provide emotional and medicinal support to the cancer affected children.•I Like School_ Can Kids: The basic aim of the I Like School_ Can Kids program is to keep the cancer children in the mainstream of the education during their treatment phase. •Post Disaster Relief Activity (PDRA): PDRA is to provide medicinal along with doctors and in kinds support in form of clothes, grains, sanitary material etc to the disaster affected people. •Healthy Living: Healthy Living is to provide multispecialty investigational support and medicinal support to the needy people in rural and urban area
